Articles.Content:
I have found in the recent 1.0.3 Update that when you have over 200 parts in the editor the game keeps facing sudden lag-spikes.

My FPS in the editor in this situation is on average 75 FPS but faces 1 second spikes of 1-2 FPS about every 8 seconds.

I have the same settings as I did in 1.0.2 but this has just started happening in today's update.

This is really troubling because these lag-spikes keep causing me to grab parts I am not trying to and makes building very hard.

Is anyone else running into this?

I've been seeing reports of log spam. You could try opening up the log file using ALT+F2 and seeing if there are a lot of entries streaming by.

Other than that, we would actually need to see your logs, pictures, or something else to help clue us in as to what might be the issue. If you need help finding that stuff, the info can be found in the sticky in this forum.

Cheers,

~Claw

I might report back on this soon. But it seemed that the 1.0.4 patch fixed the problem. I remember this behavior happening with a large number of radiator panels in the editor. With any other parts it seems to be fine.
